programme.title: Visita, o memorie e confessioni
programme.desc: Il film fu realizzato tra la fine del 1981 e il 1982, con l'intento che fosse mostrato soltanto dopo la morte del suo autore. Fu presentato per la prima volta nel 2015 a Lisbona e Cannes. Manoel de Oliveira filma la casa di Rua Vilarinha a Porto, che fece costruire su progetto dell'architetto José Porto e nella quale visse con la sua famiglia per quarant'anni, dal 1940 (anno in cui si sposò) al momento in cui fu costretto a venderla. "Su mia richiesta Agustina Bessa-Luís ha scritto un bellissimo testo, intitolato Visita. È un film mio su me stesso. Forse non andava fatto, ma è fatto Mi ricordo della mia infanzia, mi ricordo dei miei genitori, di mia moglie, dei miei figli, di un tempo che fu e di un futuro che sarà passato. Mi ricordo di me, della mia infinitesimale presenza nel tempo e nello spazio, e scompaio". (Manoel de Oliveira).

programme.title: Fuori orario. Cose (mai) viste
programme.desc: Di Ghezzi Baglivi Esposito Fina Francia Luciani Turigliatto presenta E LA NAVE VA (5) FUORI ORARIO VENEZIA 2025 di Fulvio Baglivi, Simona Fina, Roberto Turigliatto.

programme.title: Elegia della vita - Rostropovich, Vishnevskaya
programme.desc: Vita di Galina Vishnevskaya, soprano, leggenda dell'opera a livello mondiale, e del marito Mstislav Rostropovich, grande musicista celebre anche per le sue battaglie in favore di un'arte senza frontiere e libera di esprimersi. Sokurov svela, tramite un flusso di note e parole, conversazioni confidenziali e uscite pubbliche, le sorprendenti personalità di due grandi figure della cultura musicale europea. Un omaggio all'arte, alla lirica.

programme.title: Il diario di San Pietroburgo: Mozart. Requiem
programme.desc: Aleksandr Sokurov ha ripreso con cinque telecamere la messa in scena del Requiem di Mozart realizzata dallo stesso regista nella sala Piccola della Filarmonica di San Pietroburgo il 3 febbraio 2004. "La caratteristica principale dell'interpretazione è che il coro non è fermo, ma si sposta sulla scena. Gli spostamenti non sono dettati dalla partitura; le coriste si muovono in maniera caotica, si riuniscono sul proscenio, si posizionano al fondo del palcoscenico. Allo stesso modo, i solisti si muovono liberamente. Grazie al lavoro d'illuminazione, questi spostamenti creano giochi di chiaroscuro. Il montaggio del film non è tradizionale.

programme.title: Fuori orario. Cose (mai) viste

programme.title: Sorgente di vita
programme.desc: Attualità e cultura, feste e tradizioni, storia e identità degli ebrei in Italia, in Europa e nel mondo, a cura dell'Unione delle Comunità Ebraiche Italiane.

programme.title: Sulla via di Damasco
programme.desc: Eva Crosetta analizza la variegata realtà ecumenica, umana e sociale, dedita al volontariato sul territorio non solo italiano.

programme.title: La mia autostrada per il cielo - Carlo Acutis e l'Eucarestia
programme.desc: Carlo è un ragazzo normale ed è proprio in questa normalità che risiede la sua straordinarietà. Muore a soli 15 anni a causa di una leucemia fulminante, lasciando nel ricordo di tutti coloro che l'hanno conosciuto un grande vuoto ed una profonda ammirazione per quella che è stata la sua breve ma intensa testimonianza di una vita autenticamente cristiana. Una vita in una costante volontà di condivisione e dedizione all'altro.

programme.title: Ieri, oggi, domani
programme.desc: Film a episodi. "Adelina": Sophia fa la contrabbandiera di sigarette. "Anna": Sophia è un'annoiata signora milanese. "Mara": Sophia fa innamorare di sé un innocente seminarista. Oscar 1965 al Miglior Film Straniero.

programme.title: O anche no
programme.desc: Paola Severini Melograni conduce il talk di infotainment dedicato all'inclusione e alla solidarietà che racconta attraverso i protagonisti le loro storie, attese, difficoltà e conquiste.

programme.title: La ricetta della lunga vita
programme.desc: Nel 2010 l'UNESCO ha inserito la dieta mediterranea tra i patrimoni immateriali dell'umanità. È una ricchezza di tutte le popolazioni del Mediterraneo e della loro storia. La dieta mediterranea è stata studiata per la prima volta nel Cilento, in Campania, precisamente a Pioppi. Il nome Cilento deriva dall'antico nome Cis Alentum, che significava al di qua del fiume Alento. Nel 2010 l'UNESCO ha inserito la dieta mediterranea tra i patrimoni immateriali dell'umanità. programme.title: What Would You Do?
programme.desc: Cameras capture people's reactions to dilemmas.

programme.title: The Bounty
programme.desc: Mate Fletcher Christian (Mel Gibson) leads a mutiny against his friend Lt. Bligh (Anthony Hopkins) on an 18th-century voyage to Tahiti.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage).

programme.title: Orange County
programme.desc: A high schooler (Colin Hanks) tries to fix a mistake after his guidance counselor sends the wrong papers to Stanford University.

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A new student gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics. However, when she makes the misstep of falling for the queen bee's ex-boyfriend, she finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: An aging irresponsible misfit (Paul Newman) falls in love with an unhappily married younger woman (Melanie Griffith).

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: An insecure man (Will Ferrell) competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father (Mark Wahlberg) breezes back into town.

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
programme.desc: Kyle, Stan and Cartman orchestrate a resistance to an imminent war between Canada and the United States.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Unseen
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: French Girl
programme.desc: When his girlfriend gets swept away to Canada by a job offer from her ex, a hopeless romantic travels to her hometown, only to find himself out of his depth while trying to charm her hard-to-impress, French-speaking family.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge: Chasing the Dream
programme.desc: An ice skater (Matt Lanter) and his new partner (Francia Raisa) develop feelings for each other while training to compete in Paris.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: When a power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa, double crosses, adultery, murder and revenge ensue.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: The Vikings
programme.desc: Two Vikings (Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis) clash over a Welsh princess (Janet Leigh) and control of a British throne, unaware that they are half brothers.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: A master hit man (Charles Bronson) teaches the trade to an eager young man (Jan-Michael Vincent) who idolizes him.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter goes to Australia, where his new boss expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Tormented by her peers and sheltered by her religious mother (Julianne Moore), an awkward teenager (Chloë Grace Moretz) unleashes her hidden, telekinetic powers after a sick prank at her senior prom pushes her over the edge.

programme.title: Blink Twice
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: A Working Man
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A pacifist farmer (Mel Gibson) of South Carolina reluctantly joins the Revolutionary War and fights alongside his son (Heath Ledger).

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team must track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the fate of the world at stake, a deadly race around the globe begins.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: With a biting wit and brutal honesty, Kelsey Cook covers the gamut, from Brazilian waxing to career advice from her parents; rising comedian Kiry Shabazz theorizes about how a doctor's note is much more valuable than the constitution.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar (Cary Grant) sees fireworks with an American heiress (Grace Kelly) on the Riviera.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: The characters come together for a final confrontation with unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: In 1988, devout Catholic and loving mother was found murdered in her Jefferson, NJ home; investigators uncover satanic symbols and come to realize that her son is missing; was this crime the result of the occult or something far more close to home?

programme.title: Better Man
programme.desc: The true story of the meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams.

programme.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut
programme.desc: With the barbershop now coed, Calvin (Ice Cube), Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer) and the rest of the gang come up with a plan to save the neighborhood from crime.

programme.title: Madea's Witness Protection
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madea's Southern home, a Wall Street banker and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarch's special brand of tough love.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: A one-handed salesman, an Amish farm boy and a pretty con artist pull bowling scams to get to a $1 million tournament in Reno.

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: In 1990s Miami, a gym manager (Mark Wahlberg) and his muscular accomplices (Dwayne Johnson, Anthony Mackie) kidnap a wealthy businessman and force him to sign over all his assets -- including cars and a luxurious mansion -- to them.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, who founded brokerage firm Stratton Oakmont while still in his early 20s, develops habits of wretched excess and corruption.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: Gorky Park
programme.desc: A Moscow detective's investigation of a bizarre triple murder leads him to run-ins with the KGB and an American tycoon.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
programme.desc: A 1930s movie star (Jeff Daniels) steps off the screen to join a waitress (Mia Farrow) in the audience.

programme.title: Bananas
programme.desc: Rejected by his radical girlfriend (Louise Lasser), a wimpy New Yorker (Woody Allen) heads for San Marcos to lead its revolution.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol pups magically gain superpowers after a meteor strikes Adventure City. However, things take a turn for the worse when Humdinger and a mad scientist steal their powers and turn themselves into supervillains.

programme.title: Nickel Boys
programme.desc: Elwood Curtis' college dreams are shattered when he's sentenced to a brutal reformatory in the Jim Crow South. Clinging to his optimistic worldview, Elwood strikes up a friendship with a fellow Black teen who dispenses fundamental tips for survival.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise
programme.desc: An Arkansas waitress (Susan Sarandon) and a housewife (Geena Davis) shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: An English aristocrat hires Billy the Kid (Emilio Estevez) and five other outcasts to guard his New Mexico ranch.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: An Irish ringleader (Natascha McElhone) organizes an international team of hired guns (Robert De Niro, Jean Reno) to retrieve a briefcase from criminals.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: U.S. soldiers encounter heavy fire while trying to capture a warlord's associates in Mogadishu, Somalia.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A pacifist farmer (Mel Gibson) of South Carolina reluctantly joins the Revolutionary War and fights alongside his son (Heath Ledger).

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Desperate townspeople hire seven mercenaries (Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke) to battle a greedy industrialist (Peter Sarsgaard) and his ruthless henchmen in the Old West.

programme.title: Till
programme.desc: The true story of Mamie Till-Mobley's relentless pursuit of justice for her 14-year-old son, Emmett Till, who was brutally lynched in 1955 while visiting his cousins in Mississippi.

programme.title: The Kite Runner
programme.desc: After many years living in the U.S., Amir, an Afghan novelist, returns to his Taliban-controlled homeland to learn the fate of his murdered friend's son.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Scout Durwood knows what it's like to be the outsider and has created a place for herself onstage with an act unlike any other; she seamlessly blends original songs, absurd dance and provocative stand-up comedy into a hilarious performance.

programme.title: Panama
programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: After escaping from a serial killer, a doctor (Ashley Judd) helps police and a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) track the madman.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Love Me
programme.desc: A buoy and a satellite meet online long after humanity's extinction. As they learn what life was like on Earth, they discover themselves and what it means to be alive and in love.

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: The Night Clerk
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: After escaping from a serial killer, a doctor (Ashley Judd) helps police and a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) track the madman.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Beau Is Afraid
programme.desc: A paranoid man embarks on a darkly funny and nightmarish odyssey to get home to his mother.

programme.title: Carriers
programme.desc: Two brothers (Lou Taylor Pucci, Chris Pine) and two women drive through the desert in search of refuge from a deadly pandemic.

programme.title: Black Noise
programme.desc: When an elite security team is sent to a remote island to rescue a VIP, their mission takes a turn as they are confronted by masked gunmen. To keep hold of their lives, the team must act quickly to assess the situation and escape the island.

programme.title: The Night Clerk
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: The Presidio
programme.desc: An Army provost marshal (Sean Connery) clashes with a detective (Mark Harmon) over a murder at the San Francisco military base.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: The owner (Jason Bateman) of a flavor-extract factory suffers a series of personal and professional disasters following a freak workplace accident.

programme.title: The Fabulous Four
programme.desc: Lifelong friends travel to Key West, Fla., to be bridesmaids in a college girlfriend's surprise wedding. Sisterhoods are rekindled, the past resurfaces, and there are enough sparks, sex and romance to change all of their lives in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mothers (Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) go wild after ditching their daily routines.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: In the midst of his daily commute, insurance salesman Michael MacCauley is contacted by a mysterious stranger who forces him to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop.

programme.title: Dexter: Resurrection
programme.desc: Prater and Charley reveal they know a critical piece of information, forcing Dexter to go to extreme lengths; as Dexter attempts to set up a meeting with Prater, Harrison finds himself further entangled.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an epic, 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Two hit men (John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson), a boxer, a crime boss and others meet their fates over the course of two days.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Still struggling with a loss, the team must put feelings aside when a cafe is bombed; Atwater winds up in hot water after making a mistake.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A mass shooting takes place in an athletic club; Atwater deals with his new assignment; Halstead and Platt try to check up on Lindsay.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team help retired Cmdr. Perry extract his nephew from a corrupt unit; Lindsay struggles to stay clean; a woman from Olinsky's past contacts him.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence pursues heroin kingpin Derek Keyes; Lindsay's downward spiral continues; Olinsky tells Platt about a secret from his past; Roman talks to Burgess about his concerns regarding Ruzek.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
